QuestData.Title: Dearest Natalia
QuestData.Description: My dear Natalia has gone missing.$B$BTruth be told, she had been acting strangely for weeks leading up to her disappearance. I had caught her talking to herself when no one was around on more than one occasion. She was adamant that everything was ok and that she must be allowed to continue her research.$B$BShe was last seen heading to Bronzebeard's camp to the south.$B$BMy soldiers are spread too thin, $n. I need you to go to Bronzebeard's camp and question those dwarves.
QuestData.LogDescription: Question Frankal and Rutgar at Bronzebeard's Encampment about the whereabouts of Natalia Mar'alith.
QuestData.RewardText: <Commander Mar'alith's voice rings out from the shard.>$B$BWhether she is alive or dead, I must do what is right. She must be found. Alas, I am bound by duty to this outpost. Will you help me once more, $n?
